channel.title: NCL applications in this Mini PC:
channel.description: Ginga Live CD contains demo applications to introduce some NCL features even if you are not online at the moment. These applications were developed by the TeleMidia Lab and can also be found in The NCL Club.

item.title: Brasil 4K
item.description: The project "Brazil 4D" offer a interactive contente to make social inclusion with poor families in the city of João Pessoa. Four content were offered: employment opportunities; health education; welfare support information; and financial management information.

item.title: Formula 1
item.description: This is an interactive application which presents some additional content about pilots and race.

item.title: Garrincha and the First "João"
item.description: O Primeiro Joao (The First John) is a festival winning animation created by Andre Castelao under the coordination of Claudia Bolshaw and Marcos Magalhaes. The animation is inspired by an homonym chronicle about Garrincha written by Gerson Soares. This interactive application was developed by TeleMidia Lab for NCL learning purposes.

item.title: Horse race
item.description: This is a horse race game.

item.title: Pizza Hell
item.description: Pizza Hell is an interactive advertisement.

item.title: The Matrix
item.description: The Matrix is a short NCL application that illustrates causal synchronisms.

item.title: The Princess Kidnapping
item.description: The Princess Kidnapping is an interactive narrative based on fairy tales which has been adapted to a modern comedy fairy tales.

item.title: Tic Tac Toe
item.description: Tic-tac-toe, also spelled tick tack toe, and alternatively called noughts and crosses, hugs and kisses, and many other names, is a pencil-and-paper game for two players, O and X, who take turns marking the spaces in a 3×3 grid, usually X going first. The player who succeeds in placing three respective marks in a horizontal, vertical or diagonal row wins the game.

item.title: Viva Mais Peso
item.description: Viva Mais Peso helps people to find out their ideal weight.

item.title: Viva Mais Pratos
item.description: Viva Mais Pratos is one of the first Brazilian TV show produced with focus on viewer interactivity.
